Articles.Content: i was wondering if the vzor window on the onion pea and pomegranate work?

Might be the wrong forums mate...

What are you asking?

The window is functional in that you can look through it when you're inside the cabin but it doesn't have the horizon indicators that would allow you to align the window straight down. You can monitor your track through it and align prograde/retrograde fairly easily though.

For those not in the know, the Onion, Pea and Pomegranate are the Making History Soviet-style capsules. I believe the question is, do these parts have a window in them like the real Vostok/Voskhod/Soyuz (delete as appropriate) did to aid reorienting them for re-entry from IVA view, in which case the answer is probably no.
